wikitext.*: <noinclude>这个Widget的功能是优化使用了{{tl|隐藏目录}}的页面的目录。</noinclude><includeonly><!--{if !isset($wgTochide) || !$wgTochide}--><!--{assign var="wgTochide" value=true scope="global"}--><style>body.skin-vector .tochide{font-size:95%;}body.skin-vector .mw-collapsed.tochide tr:first-child td{padding:7px!important;}body.skin-vector .mw-collapsed.tochide tr:last-child td{padding:0 7px!important;}body.skin-vector .tochide tr:first-child td .mw-collapsible-toggle{top:7px!important}body.skin-vector .tochide tr:first-child td{padding:7px 7px 0!important;}body.skin-vector .tochide tr:last-child td{padding:0 7px 7px 7px!important;}body.skin-vector .tochide td{width:auto;border-width:0;}body.skin-vector .tochide div.toc#toc{margin:0;padding:0;background:none;background-color:none;border-width:0;width:100%;}body.skin-vector .tochide #toctitle{display:none;}body.skin-vector .tochide ul{background-color:transparent;margin:0.5em 1em;}</style><!--{/if}--></includeonly>
